title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize managed file transfer workflows with event-driven SFTP (STG339)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过事件驱动的SFTP实现托管文件传输工作流现代化 (STG339)
abstract: Managing file transfers can come at a high cost as you maintain infrastructure, licensing, resources, and adherence to regulatory and business requirements. In this session, learn how AWS Transfer Family provides fully managed, highly available file transfers over protocols including SFTP, and how to implement this at scale using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform. Learn how enterprises have transformed their MFT infrastructure into an event-driven architecture to reduce operational overhead. Additionally, we'll dive into how you can leverage agentic AI to automate intelligent data pipelines to process and deliver incoming data while maintaining security and compliance.
abstract_cn: 管理文件传输可能会产生高昂的成本，因为您需要维护基础设施、许可证、资源以及遵守监管和业务要求。在本次会议中，了解 AWS Transfer Family 如何提供完全托管的、高可用的文件传输服务，支持包括 SFTP 在内的多种协议，以及如何使用 Terraform 基础设施即代码 (IaC) 大规模实施此服务。了解企业如何将其托管文件传输 (MFT) 基础设施转变为事件驱动架构，以减少运营开销。此外，我们还将深入探讨如何利用代理式 AI 自动化智能数据管道，以便在保持安全性和合规性的同时处理和交付传入数据。
